name: Zombie Sniper - Assault Shoot
description:
Zombie Sniper - Assault Shoot!!!
An immersive first-person 3D adventure blending stunning graphics, excellent music and realistic sound effects to create a highly detailed world best sniper game shooting game killer shot
Features:

Witness the stunning 3D graphics with detailed textures
Enjoy the realistic sound effect and music
Bring smash death to zombies which are chasing you
Excellent border environment in forest
Fabulous sounds from GHQ and also from environment
Detailed graphics and battle environment designs
